title: Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, Steel Mesh Removable Sides, 3 cu ft, 400 lb Capacity, Green
descriptions:
### Introducing the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart – Your Ultimate Gardening Companion!

#### Why Choose the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart?

**Durable and Durable:**
- **Steel Mesh Frame:** Our cart features a robust steel mesh frame designed to withstand the toughest of gardening tasks. The steel mesh sides are both durable and lightweight, making it easier for you to manage and maneuver around your garden.
- **Quick Assembly:** No need to spend hours setting up your garden cart. With our easy-to-assemble design, you can have your cart ready in minutes, so you can get right to work.

**Versatile and Practical:**
- **Removable Side Panels:** Remove the side panels to transform your cart into a versatile flatbed cart. This feature allows you to easily transport larger items or switch between different tasks without the hassle of changing your equipment.
- **10-Inch Pneumatic Tires:** Our 10-inch pneumatic tires provide a smooth ride and excellent traction, ensuring that you can move your cart with ease on various surfaces. The tight turn radius and ample ground clearance make it easy to navigate through tight spaces.

**Built for the Job:**
- **4-Wheel Design:** Our cart is equipped with a sturdy 4-wheel design for maximum stability and control. Whether you’re carrying heavy loads or navigating uneven terrain, you can trust that your cart will handle the job.
- **400 lb Capacity:** Designed to handle the weight of your garden tools, plants, and other heavy items, the GOR400-COM can carry up to 400 pounds without compromising on performance.

**Space-Efficient and Colorful:**
- **3 cu ft Bed Dimensions:** With a generous 3 cubic foot bed, you can transport more than just a few items at a time. The dimensions are perfect for carrying a variety of garden tools, mulch, soil, and more.
- **Green Color:** Our cart comes in a vibrant green, making it not only functional but also an attractive addition to your outdoor space.

**Warranty and Safety:**
- **1-Year Limited Warranty:** We stand behind our product with a 1-year limited warranty, ensuring that you have peace of mind knowing that your investment is protected.
- **Straight Pull Handle:** Our straight pull handle design provides a comfortable and ergonomic grip, ensuring that you can handle the cart with ease for hours on end.

#### Get Ready to Transform Your Gardening Experience!

The Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart is the perfect tool for every gardener. Whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting out, this cart is designed to make your gardening tasks easier, more efficient, and more enjoyable.

**Order Now and Upgrade Your Gardening Game!**

[Add to Cart]
